name: Soul Printer
description:
Dash through enemies, get hurt, rewind back to your soul print, jump into holes, rewind again, get lost, rewind again.

Controls:

We seems to have a conflict in controls CTRL + D when you try to attack throws out a new tab. However if you keep holding D and then CTRL, no such conflict happens. 

Thanks for understanding. 

A, D - Movement
Space - Jump
E, R - Create soulprint/Rewind
F1 - Restart level

This game was created for Brackeys GameJam 2020.2 with the theme of "REWIND".
Created by Bronity: CarpenterCode & TomRivers
Any feedback is very much appreciated!
